documents.title: Leaderboard Overview
documents.content: Cloudora maintains a monthly leaderboard to motivate employees. Ranking is based on performance score, XP, CRM discipline, punctuality, and customer feedback.

documents.title: Leaderboard Scoring Logic
documents.content: Leaderboard Score = Performance Score (50%) + XP Level (25%) + CRM Discipline (15%) + Customer Feedback (10%).

documents.title: Leaderboard Rewards
documents.content: Top performers receive: certificates, bonuses, team recognition, extra XP, priority shift choices, and performance badges.
